description.p: EngPlayer is a modern, fast, and lightweight media player developed with Python and GTK4 for Linux desktops. It serves as a user-friendly entertainment hub that brings your local media library, VOD content, Podcasts, and live streams under one roof.

ul.li: IPTV Support: Seamless integration with Xtream Codes API and M3U playlists.
Smart EPG & Catch-up: Real-time program guides and archive playback support.
Recorder (PVR): Record live streams or schedule recordings for later.
Podcast Integration: Manage library, listen to episodes, and smart resume support.
External Stream: Direct playback support for external video and audio URLs.
Cinematic VOD: Automatic metadata fetching (Posters, Cast, Plot) via TMDb integration.
Trakt.tv Sync: Automatically tracks what you're watching (Scrobbling).
Local Library: Manage your Video, Music, and Picture collections with album art support.
Advanced Player: Video Settings (Brightness/Contrast), 10-Band Equalizer, Subtitle download, and PiP mode.

description.p: This release addresses playback synchronization issues and display bugs.

ul.li: Live Stream Fix: Resolved an issue where the video would pause/freeze while audio continued playing during live streams.
Display Fix: Fixed full-screen scaling issues on 1024x768 resolutions.
General: Various minor bug fixes and improvements.

description.p: This update introduces Podcast support, external stream playback, and video enhancements.

ul.li: New Feature: Added Podcast support and library.
New Feature: Added external URL playback option.
New Feature: Added Video Settings menu.
New Feature: Added Channel Information display.
Fix: Resolved IPTV slider bar functionality issues.
Fix: Corrected EPG logo matching logic.

description.p: This update introduces visual improvements and better version management.

ul.li: Dynamic EPG: Current program titles are now displayed directly in the channel list.
Visual Progress Bars: Added sleek indicators to track current program completion.
Unified Versioning: Centralized version control under core settings for better synchronization.
Initial support for Xtream Codes and M3U.
Added Background Recording and Scheduler.
Implemented TMDb and Trakt.tv integration.
